attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Global warming is only a theory.
Every day, there is a 'terrorism' of indoctrination and propaganda on this subject, which isn't understood, and is only a theory.
We ask the prime minister to carefully consider any duties he may place on carbon emissions, and if global warming theory is disproved, that he will 1/ make it statute that any individuals that have paid any charges and levies, based upon that, will be refunded in full, to prove it isn't simply a hollow cash raising excercise, and
2/ make clear and transparent precisely the amount that is raised, where it is channelled to offset that, given the reasons for the levies.
